title: FIRST EVER DENGUE VACCINE CANDIDATE TO SHOW EFFICACY AGAINST DENGUE FEVER AND DENGUE HAEMORRHAGIC FEVER IN ASIA
author: Damian Garde
description: - 88.5% reduction of Dengue Haemorrhagic Fever shown in detailed analyses of world's first phase III efficacy study published in The Lancet - - Two thirds reduction in hospitalization observed... | - 88.5% reduction of Dengue Haemorrhagic Fever shown in detailed analyses of world's first phase III efficacy study published in The Lancet - - Two thirds reduction in hospitalization observed...
